lead_paragraph: LORD--Llewellyn W.,Jr. On May 25, 2016, father of Virginia McKee and husband Robert, Ann Lord and husband, the late Gene Brezniak, and Charlotte Lord and husband Richard Lowitz; stepfather of Lynne Warns, Ellen Emerson, and Scott Parmelee; grandfather of Molly and Sarah McKee. He is also survived by four great-grandchildren and was predeceased by his wife, Skip. Memorial service will be held Saturday, 11:00am, at the Church of the Redeemer, 5603 N. Charles St., Baltimore, MD 21210, with reception to follow. Donations may be made to Gilman School, 5407 Roland Ave., Baltimore, MD 21210, or to St. Bernard's School, 4 E 98th St., New York, NY 10029. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LORD, LLEWELLYN W.
